fontTheory.description: The typography system for this resume focuses on readability and professionalism.
fontTheory.readability: The combination of Arial for headings and body text with Georgia adds contrast and enhances readability.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings are bold and in Arial to create a clear hierarchy. Body text in Georgia provides a traditional and elegant feel.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other well by balancing modernity with a classic serif font for a professional look.
